stepAnswer: The angle in the numerator is directly proportional to the side in the denominator.
stepTitle: In the Law of Sines, what is the relationship between the angle in the numerator and the side in the denominator?
choices: The angle in the numerator is directly proportional to the side in the denominator.
The angle in the numerator is inversely proportional to the side in the denominator.
The angle in the numerator has no relationship to the side in the denominator.
The angle in the numerator equals the side in the denominator.
